column1: 0107|1:07 A.M.|But the most striking difference was the time of day. Outside the basement windows
column2:
night had fallen. The streetlights were on and there was a full moon out.
“Whoa
column3: ” I heard myself whisper. I glanced at the digital alarm clock sitting on top of one of the bookshelves. Its glowing blue display said the local time was now 1:07 A.M.
